item.title: FT Most Read: Friday, December 6, 2024 at 4:20 PM UTC
item.description:
1. Boeing’s Max plea deal rejected by court over DEI provision
2. [Opinion] What if the UK isn’t actually the sick man of Europe?
3. Le Pen’s show of force puts France on notice
4. ‘Could this happen to us?’: UnitedHealth shooting prompts corporate security rethink
5. Mike Johnson and Elon Musk tell US federal staff to get back to the office
item.guid: FT Most Read: Friday, December 6, 2024 at 4:20 PM UTC
